divs: sighting detailsthis case referred to by rufos (roundtown ufo society)pete hartinger to connie mcnichols ssd\fi mufon ssd\fi connie mcnichols talked with this witness via phone interview on 8\31\2009 witness stated that he is\was staying at a local campgrounds near lancaster and at about 7:00pm est that he was out doors cooking on the grill.he looked up and saw a shiny cylinder\bullet shaped object approximately 30'-50'long and tapered in the back.it was coming in and out moving along with a strange orangish\white cloud (the witness said that the cloud did not seem to be like the other clouds but like it was being made to conceal the object).about 4,000feet in altitude,45 degrees above horizon,moving slowly to the nw.the witness did not hear any sound as he contiued watching it.duration approximately 20 seconds.
Summary: Shiny cigar / bullet shaped object seen coming in and out of strange cloud
trends: There have been 8 other sightings in Lancaster
There were no other sightings in Lancaster on or around August 30th 2009
